Antharas Watchman Theodric:
I am Gilmore, watcher of the beast Theodric...
I must monitor every breath that demon dragon takes, every twitch of its mighty tail, to assure that it does not awaken from its deep sleep. I have watched the beast for 1,000 years, since I had an army against him. We were able to subdue the beast, but he must be watched.
Do you truly desire to face Antharas, the Land Dragon? He is imprisoned in cave with no entryway. There is only one way in or out... The Hearth of Warding...
"Tell me about the portal stone."
"Tell me about the Antharas Watchers."
Quest

Antharas Watchman Theodric:
... The portal stone is the key that you need to use in order to enter the Lair of Antharas. It is given only to those who are selected by seal watchers as slayers of Antharas. If you are truly wanting to confront Antharas, go see Gabrielle who is the leader of the seal watchers and receive an approval to be a slayer of Antharas. Then, I, the earthdragon watcher Theodric will present to you a portal stone.
Return

Antharas Watchman Theodric:
... there are three Antharas Watchers. Gilmore guards the entrance to Dragon Valley. I, Theodric, guard the entrance of the Antharas Nest. Malkion used to guard the Heart of Warding... But a long time ago, he gave up on his calling and disappeared.
